institution: IMK-TRO/KIT, Karlsruhe, Germany in collaboration with the CLM community
title: CCLMcom-KIT-CCLM5-0-15 model output prepared for CORDEX-CORE
experiment: Downscaling of MPI-M-MPI-ESM-LR historical r1i1p1 (CMIP5) for AFR-22 domain
comment: Please use the following reference for this climate data: CORDEX CORE CCLM run driven by MPI-ESM-LR historical (CMIP5) performed by KIT Karlsruhe in collaboration with the CLM-Community
